text: fsyru -ayha almshrkwn- fi al'ard mddat arbet ashhr, tadhhabun hayth shitum aminin min almwmnyn, waelamuu 'anakum ln tuflitu min aleqwbt, wa'ana allah mdhl alkafirin wmwrthhm alear fi aldnya, walnaar fi alakhr. whdhh alayat ldhwy alehwd almutlaqat ghyr almwqtt, 'aw min lah eahid dun arbet ashhr, fykmmal lah arbet ashhr, 'aw man kan lah eahid fnqdh
